channel.title: I never got why PKing was so fun for some people
channel.description:
But now I understand after using Vengeance and Goliath gloves ;)
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/2rl1K.png[/img] ^This is my favorite loot, mainly because it is my first loot worth more than 1M, and the guy said "I hate those gloves" 2 seconds before I veng combo'd him :P
Why do you guys like (or dislike) pking?

item.title: I never got why PKing was so fun for some people
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

prices went down so fucking much holy shit

Read full topic
item.source: I never got why PKing was so fun for some people

item.title: I never got why PKing was so fun for some people
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

Very few say fight now half just attack you unless you look like you are half decent but even then a lot just attack now.

Read full topic
item.source: I never got why PKing was so fun for some people

item.title: I never got why PKing was so fun for some people
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

My first time I ever went PKing was when I was a little kid and had my entire bank in my inventory without any armor on. This was before the wilderness ditch update… Lost my 10k cash + other useless shit and raged. I’ve honestly never killed anybody in the wilderness before on RuneScape, nor have I attempted.

Read full topic
item.source: I never got why PKing was so fun for some people

item.title: I never got why PKing was so fun for some people
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:43, topic:456495”]Basically they say ‘good luck?’ meaning they are asking if you are willing to say good luck. Because saying good luck usually means you are going to fight

It’s just semantics[/quote]

It’s stupid though, i want someone to come up to me and say “fite at hills?”
I went to hills the other day on my f2p pure, me and another guy met in the wildy and teamed up (it’s like the old days - you don’t get backstabbed!) and went to hills… there were 6 people there. 6! On the closest-to-full f2p world.

Read full topic
item.source: I never got why PKing was so fun for some people

item.title: I never got why PKing was so fun for some people
item.dc:creator: @Nothing1 -Nothing
item.description:
@Nothing1 wrote:

I hate when people first attempt to rush you 5 times and fail, and when 6th time comes and they manage to kill you they’re like ‘GF’. lol.

Read full topic
item.source: I never got why PKing was so fun for some people

item.title: I never got why PKing was so fun for some people
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Basically they say ‘good luck?’ meaning they are asking if you are willing to say good luck. Because saying good luck usually means you are going to fight

It’s just semantics

Read full topic
item.source: I never got why PKing was so fun for some people

item.title: I never got why PKing was so fun for some people
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“ranger squad, post:40, topic:456495”][quote author=-Nothing link=topic=559435.msg4093363#msg4093363 date=1346614417]

Can someone please explain to me what “Gl?” means? Because recently people do it to me a lot, and “Good luck?” does not make sense.

It means ‘Good luck’, and it is usually used upon start of the fight. It can also be a question(Gl?) as in ‘Do you want to fight?’. However, in my opinion the words ‘GF’, ‘GL’ etc are annoyingly overused.
[/quote]

Why don’t people say “Fight?” then? What does “Good luck?” mean? XD[/quote]

People say “Fight?” all the time as well, or at least they used to lol.

Read full topic
item.source: I never got why PKing was so fun for some people

item.title: I never got why PKing was so fun for some people
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

[quote=“ranger squad, post:40, topic:456495”][quote author=-Nothing link=topic=559435.msg4093363#msg4093363 date=1346614417]

Can someone please explain to me what “Gl?” means? Because recently people do it to me a lot, and “Good luck?” does not make sense.

It means ‘Good luck’, and it is usually used upon start of the fight. It can also be a question(Gl?) as in ‘Do you want to fight?’. However, in my opinion the words ‘GF’, ‘GL’ etc are annoyingly overused.
[/quote]

Why don’t people say “Fight?” then? What does “Good luck?” mean? XD[/quote]

“gl?” is easier to type.

Good luck? just means that that person wants to fight. Kind of hard to explain it better.

Read full topic
item.source: I never got why PKing was so fun for some people

item.title: I never got why PKing was so fun for some people
item.dc:creator: @Nothing1 -Nothing
item.description:
@Nothing1 wrote:

ranger squad:

Can someone please explain to me what “Gl?” means? Because recently people do it to me a lot, and “Good luck?” does not make sense.

It means ‘Good luck’, and it is usually used upon start of the fight. It can also be a question(Gl?) as in ‘Do you want to fight?’. However, in my opinion the words ‘GF’, ‘GL’ etc are annoyingly overused.

Read full topic

item.title: I never got why PKing was so fun for some people
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

Faggots saying, “L nic safe bro” “l2pk” “wow kid” “gtfo” and the lack of honor turned me off f2p pking. Was really fun to pk back in the day and f2p pking is only tolerable if you don’t have some faggot over reacting.

Read full topic
item.source: I never got why PKing was so fun for some people

[quote=“Kidpaparoach, post:35, topic:456495”]Rushers every 2mins ruins pking^[/quote]There aren’t very many rushers on world 2. Its more fun pking than “OMG GOTTA WIN THIS ASDFGHKL:”

Read full topic

item.source: I never got why PKing was so fun for some people

item.title: I never got why PKing was so fun for some people
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

I really loved it. Then again I’d probably hate it today. All there was to it was to have Vengeance pre-casted, find a fight, pot, and end the fight in 3 seconds flat with Vengeance. Your biggest concern about a P.J. were Dbowers, but now you have that Korasi and Storm of Armadyl content and what-not. I’d probably get 2-smacked on the level 1 Wilderness line if I tried to P.K. today.

Read full topic
item.source: I never got why PKing was so fun for some people

item.title: I never got why PKing was so fun for some people
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

Kilns easier than learning the fight caves (non gano method). You stick to certain positions, afk a lot (non melee method) and your done.
Its really not that hard once you know how to do it, you repeat what you know works and can keep doing it again = easy since they spawn in the same location exl har aken itself.
Btw nice loots but if your gonna pk at least bring a lil bit of risk, nobody likes a no risk (250k isn’t risk, when I rune pk I’m risking 600k’ish and thats if I prot whip).

Read full topic
item.source: I never got why PKing was so fun for some people

One for my house cape rack, one for normal wearing, and one to sacrifice for kiln entry. I sacrificed but haven’t tried the kiln yet :P[/quote]I still need to get my second cape for trying out the kiln. I need a TokHaar-Kal soon :s
